raw_mentions:
High-affinity antibody preparations with K<sub>a</sub> ranging from about 10<sup>9</sup> to 10<sup>12</sup> L/mole are prefeπed for use in immunoassays in which the NHREC-antibody complex must withstand rigorous manipulations.
Low-affinity antibody preparations with K<sub>a</sub> ranging from about 10<sup>6</sup> to 10<sup>7</sup> L/mole are prefeπed for use in immunopurification and similar procedures which ultimately require dissociation of NHREC, preferably in active form, from the antibody
